title: Bryant McFadden on rookie contracts, new helmet/targeting rule (Football 08/01)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports Bryant McFadden to talk about the latest NFL news and notes, including the decision by the Jets to try and squeeze interesting language into Sam Darold's contract as well as the Bears for doing the same on Roquan Smith's deal. They also discuss the NFL's new helmet rule, and Will breaks down the latest NFL news from Tuesday, including Stefon Diggs' new contract, Richard Sherman's aggressive comments and Doug Baldwin's injury.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
